Top 5 Android Ice Cream Sandwich Tablets under Rs 10,000 in India

By
prabhu
-
Published On: April 14, 2012 | Last Updated: January 27, 2014

Now tablets everywhere. From Apple to Amazon to even Micromax and Zync. Almost every mobile manufacturing or assembling companies are joining the race to grab tablet market share. Here in India, several domestic companies too are showing interest with their low budget tablets. We have spotted some good, out of many, tablets in the Indian market that are within the price range of Rs 10,000 and run on Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich operating system. Below are their details in chronological order from low price to high.

Micromax Funbook

Indian mobile company Micromax has come up with its second budget tablet, the Micromax Funbook, a 7-inch Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich OS tablet. It is equipped with 1.2 GHz Cortex A8 CPU and 3D Graphics. It is also pre-loaded with educational and study materials. Brief Specifications and Features of Micromax Funbook:
  • Processor – 1.2 GHz single core processor
  • Operating System – Android 4.0 ICS OS
  • RAM – 512 MB
  • Internal memory – 4GB
  • Display – 7-inch multi-touch capacitive screen
  • Resolution – 480×800 pixels
  • Camera – 0.3 megapixel
  • Wireless protocol – Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g
  • Modem support – 3G
  • USB 2.0
  • Battery – 2800 mAh
Price of Micromax Funbook: Micromax has tagged the Funbook for Rs 6,500 in the Indian market.

iberry BT07i

iberry too joins the race of grabbing Indian tablet market with its low budget iberry BT07i tablet. Run on Android 2.3 Gingerbread OS, the tablet is powered by 1.0 GHz ARM Cortex A8 processor and supports 3G graphics. Brief Specifications and Features of iberry BT07i:
  • OS – Android 2.3 Gingerbread operating system
  • CPU – 1.0 GHz ARM Cortex A8 processor
  • GPU – 400 MHz Open GL
  • 3D Graphics – OpenGL ES 2.0
  • RAM – 512 MB DDR2
  • Display – 7-inch touchscreen
  • Wireless protocol – Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g
  • Internal memory – 4GB
  • Expandable memory support – Up to 32 GB
  • Battery – 3600 mAh
  • Supports – HDMI output and full HD 1080p
Price of iberry BT07i: It is priced Rs 7,990.

HCL ME U1

Starting at just Rs 8,000, the HCL ME U1 is a 7-inch capacitive display tablet PC with resolution of 800×480 pixels. This is the first budget tablet from HCL run on Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich OS. HCL ME U1 is pre-loaded with seventeen apps covering music, social network, games and jokes. Brief Specifications and Features of HCL ME U1:
  • Display – 7-inch capacitive touchscreen
  • Resolution – 800×480 pixels
  • RAM – 512 MB
  • Internal memory – 4GB
  • Front facing camera
  • USB and mini USB ports
  • microSD card slot
  • 3600 mAh battery
  • 3G compatible via USB modem
Price of HCL ME U1: HCL has price tagged it as Rs 7,999 in the Indian market.

Zync Pad Z990

This is another low budget tablet in the Indian market – the Zync Pad Z990. Having simple user interface, the tablet runs on Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich OS and is powered by 1.2 GHz processor. Brief Specifications and Features of Zync Pad Z990:
  • OS – Android v4.0 ICS operating system
  • CPU – 1.2 GHz processor
  • RAM – 1GB
  • Display – 7-inch capacitive touchscreen
  • Resolution – 800×480 pixels
  • Camera – 0.3 megapixel front camera
  • Internal memory – 4 GB
  • Wireless protocol – Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n
  • 3G enabled
  • Ports – USB v2.0 and HDMI
  • Battery – 3600 mAh
  • Supports – External keyboard and several media formats
Price of zync Pad Z990: Noida based company Zync has price tagged its tablet as Rs 8.990.

Karbonn Smart Tab 1

Karbonn Smart Tab 1 tablet can be said as a super stylish tablet in the Indian market for budget people. It is a 7-inch tablet run on Android 4.0.3 Ice Cream Sandwich operating system and equipped with 1.2 GHz processor. Brief Specifications and Features of Karbonn Smart Tab 1:
  • CPU – 1.2 GHz processor
  • OS – Android 4.0.5 ICS
  • Display – 7-inch capacitive multi-touch screen
  • Camera – 2.0 megapixels front camera
  • External Memory – Up to 32 GB with microSD card or T-Flash card
  • Wireless protocol – Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/h
  • Ports – USB and HDMI
  • Battery – 3700 mAh
Price of Karbonn Smart Tab 1: Karbonn has tagged the Smart Tab 1 at Rs 10,550 in the Indian market. By the time you reach to this article the prices of the above tablets may even be slashed down if you check them on online shopping sites such as FlipKart, FutureBazaar, Letsbuy etc.
